mapper.sql: id, name, code, mail, address, tel, status, credit_rating, production_capacity, quality, create_time, update_time, create_user_id, update_user_id, remark
mapper.select:
select s.* from supplier_company s where s.status = 'A'
AND s.name LIKE '%${param.name}%'
AND s.code LIKE '%${param.code}%'
AND s.credit_rating = #{param.creditRating}
select s.* from supplier_company s where s.status = 'P'
mapper.insert: insert into supplier_company (id, name, code, mail, address, tel, status, credit_rating, production_capacity, quality, create_time, update_time, create_user_id, update_user_id, remark ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditRating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productionCapacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update supplier_company
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
credit_rating = #{creditRating,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
production_capacity = #{productionCapacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quality = #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
